mapper.sql: select u.*, m.*, submit_at, is_accepted, image_url from user_mission um join user u on u.user_id = um.user_id join mission m on m.mission_id = um.mission_id
mapper.insert: insert into user_mission (user_id, mission_id, image_url) values (#{userId}, #{missionId}, #{imageUrl})
mapper.select: select * from user_mission where user_id = #{userId} and mission_id=#{missionId}
